Identity.Name: Celintran Lancer
Identity.Basic_Description: Heavily armored knights on horseback with golden aura lances

Abilities.Name: Lancer
Abilities.Ability: If this unit is mounted and moves more than 3 before attacking, it gains 2 strength.

Abilities.Name: Draw Sword
Abilities.Ability: As an action this units sprint value becomes 3, it loses the lancer ability, and it gains 5 skill for the rest of the game.
Abilities.Template: Mount Token (Put this on your Celintran Lancer your card at the beginning of the game and remove after using ability)
